name: 10th International conference on Advanced Computing
content: 10th International conference on Advanced Computing (ADCOM 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Advanced Computing. The Conference focuses on all technical and practical aspects of high performance computing, green computing, pervasive computing, cloud computing etc. The goal of this conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on understanding advances in computing and establishing new collaborations in these areas.
